name: Dissensio
description:
Discover the secret of the abbaye

Dissensio is an atmospheric horror game taking place in a middle-age abbaye during the Plague.

Escape this nightmare

You wake up after an horrible nightmare, but all the monks fleed the abbaye. What happened? Where are your brothers? What is the huge secret hiding in the darkest halls of the abbaye of Saint-Martin?

Collect candles

Find candles and use them to light up your way in the dark and mysterious places, but beware of the darkness, it is your enemy, but not the only one.

Supporter Edition

The supporter edition is a special edition of the game that you can buy to support our work (since the game is free). The supporter edition contains :

  • Development archives containing : 
    • Exclusive screenshots of the development of the game
    • Exclusive videos of the first prototypes of the game
    • Two early playable builds of the game
  • A copy of the OST of the game with exclusive bonus tracks 
  • HD wallpapers of the game

NOTE : The supporter edition does not contain the game but only the exclusive content.
